content.question: The White and Black populations in New England shown in the table most directly suggest the

choices.label: movement of indentured servants from the South to New England
expansion of plantation agriculture to New England
minimal use of enslaved labor in New England compared to other regions
spread of trans-Atlantic print culture among Puritans in New England

content.answer: minimal use of enslaved labor in New England compared to other regions

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
